Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
UserController
ApplicantController
public class ApplicantController extends UserController
Controller.

This ApplicantController class manages actions performed by an Applicant. Provides methods for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting enquiries, viewing available projects, applying to projects, viewing applied projects, and requesting application withdrawal. Inherits from UserController

    Constructs an ApplicantController for the specified applicant.

      Constructs an ApplicantController for the specified applicant.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • viewEnquiries

      public void viewEnquiries()
      Displays all enquiries made by the applicant.

    • createEnquiry

      public void createEnquiry(Project project, String msg)
      Creates a new enquiry for the specified project with the given message.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to enquire about
      msg - the enquiry message

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String msg)
      Edits the message of an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to edit
      msg - the new message

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Deletes an enquiry from the system.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to delete

    • viewProjects

      public ArrayList<Project> viewProjects()
      Returns a list of projects visible and available for the applicant to apply for. Projects are filtered based on applicant's age, marital status, project visibility, flat availability, and whether the applicant is already an officer in charge.
      Returns:
      a list of visible Project objects, or null if no projects are available

    • applyProject

      public void applyProject(Project project, int flatTypeChoice)
      Allows the applicant to apply for a project with a selected flat type. Prevents applying if the applicant already has an application or is an officer registered for the project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to apply for
      flatTypeChoice - the flat type selected (e.g., 2 or 3 rooms)

    • viewAppliedProject

      public void viewAppliedProject()
      Displays the applicant's currently applied project and application details. Prints a message if no application is found.

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication()
      Requests withdrawal of the applicant's current application if not already requested. Prints appropriate messages based on the request status.
